name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HiGPT: Share your ChatGPT prompts and answers

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share your ChatGPT prompts and answers with friends and coworkers. Improve your chatGPT skills

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HiGPT (short for "Highly Intelligent GPT") is a chrome extension that allows users to access chatGPT's library of interesting prompts and answers. It is designed to make it easy for users to share conversations between themselves and chatGPT, making it a great tool for sharing content, asking questions and sharing tough questions and funny answers. In addition, friends who receive the shared link can also rate and comment on the content, making it a great way to get feedback and engage in conversations with others.

The HiGPT chrome extension is free to use and can be downloaded from the chrome or firefox app store. You can also visit the HiGPT website, higpt.wiki, to learn more about the application and access additional resources. The website includes information on how to use the extension, as well as tips and tricks for getting the most out of it.

The HiGPT chrome extension has a user-friendly interface that makes it easy for users to navigate and find the information they need. The main feature of the extension is access to chatGPT's library of interesting prompts and answers, which can be used to generate new conversations and ideas. Users can also share their conversations with others by creating a shareable link, which can be sent to friends and colleagues. Additionally, HiGPT allows to save the conversations for future reference.

HiGPT Chrome Extension Features:

+ Access to chatGPT's library of interesting prompts and answers.

+ Share conversations between users and chatGPT.

+ Easy sharing of content, questions, and answers.

+ Ability to ask tough questions and share funny answers.

+ Rating and commenting feature for friends who receive shared links.

+ Free to use and available for download on Chrome and Firefox app stores.

+ User-friendly interface.

+ Option to save the conversations.

HiGPT is a great tool for anyone who wants to access chatGPT's library of interesting prompts and answers, share their conversations with others, and engage in conversations with friends and colleagues. It's easy to use, free to download and provides a lot of value for those who are interested in using GPT for content generation and conversation.

The HiGPT chrome extension is developed based on Sharegpt, which is a similar tool designed for easy sharing of GPT-generated content.
